settings.custom_liquid:
Acne treatments clear your skin. Fact?

Wrong.

You thought you had found an acne solution but ended up getting dry, sensitive skin. You stop using the treatment, your pores become clogged and your acne returns. Usual acne medications don’t change the way your skin behaves. Ours does. No dry skin, no sensitivity, no redness. Simply, the skin you deserve. Clinically proven results. 100% natural ingredients.

On TrustPilot

But How?
We use red algae.The superfood for your skin.

Through extracting Astaxanthin, the bio-active compound in red algae and a powerful antioxidant. Using our innovative cold-press technology we can preserve all the nutrients, vitamins and minerals your skin needs to treat roscaea all by itself. With zero side-effects. Our Recovery & Repair gel is a TRANSPORTER. meaning it allows much better penetration of all ingredients through the skin’s dermis and increases healthy turnover of your cells. So instead of masking the problem, we treat it.
Healthy Skin Best-Sellers

Seacra Success Stories
97% success rate in our clinical trials in 28 days

A 100% natural treatment with ZERO side-effects

Do you have a specific skin concern?
Find out how our innovative red algae gel can help treat your specific skin concerns

No more bad skin days. Ever.
Why suffer side-effects when you don’t have to?
The Recovery & Repair Gel is 100% natural so it has zero side-effects.

settings.heading: Astaxanthin
settings.description: Astaxanthin, the bio-active compound in red algae contains ten times more vitamin A than retinol, 6000 times more potent than vitamin C and 550 times more potent than vitamin E

settings.heading: Hylauronic acid
settings.description: Hylauronic acid dries you skin out under low humidity conditions

settings.heading: Axaleic acid
settings.description: Azaleic acid causes dryness, peeling and itching of the skin.

settings.custom_liquid:
Want glowing skin?
Get a microdermabrasion...or use our gel.
Celebrities have access to the best dermatologists in the world and have the luxury of getting a microdermabrasion every week to give them that five-star glow. Imagine being able to have a microdermabrasion every day. No purging, No downtime. Simply, glowing skin. The Recovery & Repair Gel, the ultimate in non-invasive, life-changing skincare

Find out how Jilian broke the cycle of bad skin for good. Meet Jilian.
She felt self-conscious, insecure and unhappy. All because of her skin.
